name: FrenchdictationbyTV5MONDE
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the french dictation
des:
Alexa will dictate a text to you. Rise to the challenge and make as few mistakes as possible.

How it works:
Just say "Alexa, launch the french dictation"
Choose your level, and we will offer you a dictation suitable for your level.
You can receive a link to the dictation correction directly on your phone or email address.

Need assistance? Ask for help by saying "help."
Want to exit? Say: "Cancel" or "Quit" at any time.

 The skill contains content in french.
